articles.content: Simone Biles blamed USA Gymnastics and the FBI for enabling disgraced doctor Larry Nassar's sexual abuse to dozens of women and girls, as she recounted her own trauma in a hearing over the agency's f… [+32684 chars]

articles.author: Natasha Hooper
articles.title: Kieron Dyer reveals he viciously attacked SAS instructor Jason Fox - Daily Mail
articles.description: The former footballer, 42, viscously beats up SAS: Who Dares Wins instructor Jason 'Foxy' Fox during a challenge on Sunday's episode, according to reports.
articles.content: Fans of endurance based reality show SAS: Who Dares Wins will see former England footballer Kieron Dyer physically attack hardman instructor Jason Fox during its next instalment, which airs on Sunday… [+7124 chars]
